attributes.action: The people of Britain have no faith in the major parties delivering a referendum. We insist on our right to put forward our vote as to leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details: We the British people have no faith in any of the major parties providing us with the opportunity to vote to leave the EU. We are not prepared to wait any longer and believe that we have the right to vote now. There are no grounds legal nor otherwise that should impede our decision. We must be heard as this matter has long been a topic of debate yet the people are again left out. We ask the home office to listen to the people and ensure that the Government is forced to allow us to speak
